title: Workflow Simplification & Onboarding Guide
description: Streamline the Feature Flow workflow by: (1) Creating an onboarding guide page explaining workflow stages, (2) Merging create-brief and start-discovery into a single /discover skill with complexity assessment, (3) Building a multi-step project initialization wizard form in the Electron app with pre-fill from existing config.
acceptance_criteria: Onboarding guide page at /guide with step-by-step tutorial. New /discover skill combines brief + discovery. Project wizard at /init-project with 4-step progress. All tests pass.
close_reason: All tasks complete. 320 tests passing. Fixed guide to show 4 workflow stages (merged /discover). Added padding to init-project page.

title: Create onboarding guide markdown content
description: Write docs/ONBOARDING.md with step-by-step tutorial explaining workflow stages (init → discover → approve → run). Include command examples and what each stage produces.

title: Add IPC handlers for project config read/write
description: Add project:readConfig and project:writeConfig handlers in src/main/ipc/handlers.ts. Use js-yaml for YAML serialization. Add project:createScaffold for directory creation.

description: Write tests for new routes /init-project and /guide. Test navigation links render correctly.

description: Update src/renderer/App.tsx to add /init-project and /guide routes. Add navigation links with Wand2 and GraduationCap icons.

acceptance_criteria: All checklist items verified. Close-up report generated.
close_reason: All verification passed. Epic tests: 321 pass. Build: success. TypeCheck: pass.

title: Fix: Remove 'Switching project' overlay on Kanban navigation
description: The 'Switching project...' overlay appears every time you navigate to Kanban, even when not switching projects. Issue: KanbanBoard.tsx calls fetchIssues() without silent mode, which sets isLoading=true. Fix: Add isSwitchingProject flag separate from isLoading, or use silent mode for non-project-switch fetches.

title: Retrospective Analysis Skill (/retro)
description: A managed skill that analyzes epic execution telemetry, identifies patterns and improvements, generates actionable recommendations, and accumulates learnings over time. Integrates with the agent_telemetry system and can be triggered from /run-tasks Step 10 or standalone.

title: Create retro skill directory and SKILL.md
description: Create .claude/skills/retro/SKILL.md with full skill definition including process steps, output format, and examples

title: Add analysis query helpers to TelemetryService
description: Ensure getEpicSummary, getAgentPerformance, and getBugCausingTelemetry return data in format needed for retro analysis

title: Create INSIGHTS.md template and schema
description: Create .claude/retrospectives/INSIGHTS.md with structured format for tracking metrics over time, efficiency trends, common failure patterns

title: Update run-tasks SKILL.md Step 10

title: Add --dry-run flag support
description: Add --dry-run option to preview recommendations without writing any files

title: Verify retro skill end-to-end
description: Verify skill works end-to-end: run against test epic, check output format, verify INSIGHTS.md updates

title: Fix: Capture agent telemetry during /run-tasks execution
description: The run-tasks skill should capture telemetry after each agent completes (Step 4a). Currently not being recorded to agent_telemetry table in discovery.db. Need to insert telemetry with task_id, epic_id, agent_type, status, duration, files_modified, etc.

title: Test-Driven Development Workflow
description: Implement a true Test-First Development workflow where tests are written and must fail before implementation begins. Includes test-writer agent, debug-agent with knowledge base, and modifications to /approve-spec and /run-tasks skills.

description: Add workflow.tdd_enabled boolean and update JSON schema

title: Dark Mode Design System with shadcn/ui
description: Complete design system overhaul implementing dark mode only UI using shadcn/ui components and lucide-react icons. Replace all custom Tailwind components and emoji icons with a consistent, professional visual language based on Tailwind slate/sky palette.
acceptance_criteria:
- All 16+ components converted to dark mode using slate-950/900/800 backgrounds
- All emojis (30+ instances) replaced with lucide-react icons
- shadcn/ui components installed and configured
- CSS variables theming system implemented in globals.css
- Navigation sidebar uses lucide-react icons
- .design folder updated with Colors.md, Typography.md, Spacing.md, Components.md
- No bg-white or bg-gray-50 classes remain in codebase
- All status indicators use consistent icon + color system
- Drag-and-drop functionality preserved in Kanban view

title: Setup shadcn/ui infrastructure and dark mode foundation
description: Initialize shadcn/ui CLI, configure components.json for dark mode CSS vars, update tailwind.config.cjs with slate/sky theme, install lucide-react

title: Create emoji-to-lucide icon mapping system
description: Audit all emoji usage, create IconMap utility with lucide-react equivalents, update StatusIndicator as proof of concept

title: Install and configure shadcn core components
description: Install button, card, badge, input, select, separator, label components via shadcn CLI

title: Migrate Kanban components to shadcn/ui
description: Replace KanbanCard, KanbanColumn, KanbanFilters with shadcn Card, Badge, Input, Select. Replace emojis with lucide icons. Preserve DnD functionality.

title: Migrate Pipeline components to shadcn/ui
description: Replace PipelineBoard, PipelineColumn, BriefCard, BriefDetailView, AgentActivityPanel with shadcn components. Replace emoji status indicators.

title: Migrate Briefs view and common components
description: Replace BriefsList, BriefFullDetail, Toast with shadcn equivalents. Install scroll-area, progress, toast components.

title: Migrate App.tsx navigation and settings
description: Replace navigation sidebar inline SVGs with lucide icons, update Settings view inputs/buttons to shadcn components.

title: Update .design documentation
description: Update Colors.md, Components.md, Typography.md to reflect implemented shadcn/ui system. Add component usage examples and CSS variable reference.

title: Cross-browser testing and polish
description: Test all views in Electron, verify scrollbars styled for dark mode, check contrast ratios, verify all interactive states.

title: Improve: Increase file watcher debounce to reduce flickering
description: Current debounce may be too short (50ms). Increase to 200-300ms to reduce UI flickering during rapid file changes. Check subscribeToChanges in beadsStore.ts.

title: Project Initializer Skill (/init-project)
description: A guided wizard skill that captures project configuration through progressive disclosure, creating project.yaml at repository root along with full directory scaffold (.claude/, .beads/, .design/). Supports all project types including monorepo with multiple apps. Generates custom SME agent definitions via guided questions using the agent-creator skill.
acceptance_criteria:
- User can complete minimal setup (purpose + one stack) in under 5 minutes
- Skill creates valid project.yaml with schema_version field at repository root
- User can skip optional sections (design system, data governance, SME agents)
- User can re-run skill to add or modify sections without losing existing config
- Skill validates that referenced design system docs exist before saving
- Skill supports defining multiple apps with separate stacks (monorepo support)
- Guided questions produce valid agent .md files compatible with Claude Code
- Full scaffold creates .claude/, .beads/, .design/ directories correctly
- Running on existing project detects and preserves existing config
- /start-discovery reads project.yaml and selects configured SME agents
- /approve-spec uses stack config for verification commands
- Skill displays summary of created files and What Next guidance

title: Define project.yaml JSON Schema
description: Create formal JSON schema for validation and IDE support. Include all sections with proper types and defaults.
acceptance_criteria: Schema validates example configs correctly

title: Update downstream skills to read project.yaml
description: Modify /start-discovery to select SME agents from project config. Modify /approve-spec to use stack testing config for verification commands.
acceptance_criteria: Downstream skills use project.yaml when present, graceful fallback when absent

title: Add completion summary and What Next guidance
description: After setup completes, display summary of created files/directories and guidance on next steps (run /create-brief to start first feature).
acceptance_criteria: Clear output showing all created artifacts and next steps

title: Integration tests with full workflow
description: Test complete flow: init-project -> create-brief -> start-discovery -> verify SME agents used -> approve-spec -> verify test commands from stack config.
acceptance_criteria: End-to-end workflow completes using project configuration

title: Create /init-project skill skeleton
description: Create SKILL.md with YAML frontmatter and process steps outline. Define the guided wizard flow structure.
acceptance_criteria: Skill file parses correctly, shows in skill list

title: Implement core wizard flow
description: Build the progressive disclosure wizard: required questions first (name, purpose, primary stack), then optional sections. Handle user responses and build config object.
acceptance_criteria: Can complete minimal setup in under 5 minutes

title: Build config merge logic
description: Detect existing project.yaml, load and parse, show diff to user, offer merge/replace options, backup existing to .bak before overwrite.
acceptance_criteria: Existing config preserved when merging, .bak created

title: Implement directory scaffold creation
description: Create .claude/, .claude/skills/, .claude/agents/, .beads/ directories. Generate template CLAUDE.md and config.yaml if not exist.
acceptance_criteria: All expected directories and files created on clean directory

title: Add design system scaffold workflow
description: When design_system.enabled, create .design/ directory with template markdown files (Colors.md, Typography.md, Components.md) with starter content.
acceptance_criteria: Design docs created with useful starter templates

title: Integrate agent-creator for custom SME agents
description: Add guided question flow for creating domain SME agents. Use agent-creator skill patterns to generate proper .md files in .claude/agents/.
acceptance_criteria: Generated SME agent can be spawned without errors

title: Add validation for referenced docs
description: Before saving config, validate that any referenced files (design docs, agent prompts) exist. Warn user if missing.
acceptance_criteria: Warning shown when referencing non-existent file

title: Implement monorepo multi-app support
description: Allow defining multiple apps with separate stacks using stacks.apps[] array pattern. Each app has name, path, and stack config.
acceptance_criteria: Can init project with 2+ apps, each with different stacks

title: Pipeline View & Discovery Visualization
description: A read-only Electron visualization layer that displays the workflow pipeline from Briefs through Discovery to Tasks. Provides real-time updates via file watching.
acceptance_criteria:
- Pipeline board displays workflow stages: Draft, In Discovery, Spec Review, Approved, Active
- Cards show brief/spec summary with status indicators
- Clicking a card shows detail view
- Real-time updates when files change (debounced)
- Agent activity panel shows: state, files, duration, tokens
- Blocked/failed tasks trigger visual alerts
- All items displayed without filtering for MVP

title: Add Pipeline route to App.tsx navigation
SQLite WAL mode and error handling
Add DISCOVERY IPC channels and handlers
Extend preload with discovery API and events
Real-time Kanban Performance
description: Improve Kanban board responsiveness to feel real-time when beads data changes. Root cause: beadsStore doesn't subscribe to file change events.

title: Add beads event subscription to beadsStore
description: Add subscribeToChanges() method to beadsStore.ts following the pattern in discoveryStore.ts
acceptance_criteria: subscribeToChanges() method exists, subscribes to onBeadsChange, calls fetchIssues() on change, returns unsubscribe function

title: Subscribe to beads changes in KanbanBoard
description: Call subscribeToChanges() in KanbanBoard useEffect and clean up on unmount
acceptance_criteria: useEffect subscribes on mount, cleanup calls unsubscribe, board auto-refreshes when .beads/ files change

title: Reduce debounce latency
description: Reduce file watcher debounce from 200ms to 100ms and IPC debounce from 300ms to 150ms
acceptance_criteria: File watcher debounce reduced to 100ms, IPC debounce reduced to 150ms, no duplicate events on rapid changes

title: Add loading indicator during refresh
description: Show subtle loading state when auto-refreshing so users know data is updating
acceptance_criteria: Refresh icon spins during fetch, no jarring flash or layout shift, loading state clears when complete
close_reason: Already implemented - RefreshCw icon has animate-spin class when isLoading

title: Implement optimistic updates for status changes
description: Update UI immediately when user changes status, before CLI confirms. Rollback on failure.
acceptance_criteria: updateIssueStatus updates local state BEFORE calling beads.update(), rollback on failure with error toast, ignore file watcher events for issues being updated

title: Epic close-up checklist
description: Final verification: run typecheck, verify real-time updates work, test with rapid bd commands
acceptance_criteria: npm run typecheck passes, manual test confirms <300ms update latency

title: Project Wizard Launches Claude Code for Full Init
description: After user completes ProjectWizard form, save data to project.yaml, launch terminal with Claude Code at project path, show loading screen with instructions to run /init-project. Claude Code auto-detects existing config and uses values. Parade detects completion via project.yaml validation polling + manual confirm button.
acceptance_criteria: Form data written to project.yaml. Terminal launches with claude command. Loading screen shows instructions. Cross-platform support. /init-project auto-detects config. Completion via polling or manual confirm. Terminal exit triggers recovery. 10-min timeout graceful degradation.

title: Create TerminalLauncher service
description: Cross-platform service to detect preferred terminal and launch with command. Support macOS (Terminal.app, iTerm2), Windows (cmd, PowerShell, Windows Terminal), Linux (gnome-terminal, xterm fallback). Include path escaping for security.

title: Add terminal IPC handlers
description: Add terminal:detect and terminal:launch IPC channels. Wire to preload and expose to renderer.

title: Create InitCompletionWatcher service
description: Service that polls project.yaml every 2s, validates structure is complete (has required fields populated by /init-project), emits completion/timeout events. Include terminal process exit detection.

title: Update ProjectWizard success flow
description: After scaffolding succeeds, write form data to project.yaml, launch terminal via IPC, transition to new loading screen state. Track terminal PID for exit detection.

title: Create WaitingForInit loading screen
description: New wizard view state showing: instructions to run /init-project, polling indicator, manual Done button, timeout handling. Handle terminal exit with recovery options dialog.

description: Replace path text input with native folder picker button + DragDropZone. Show project list with remove buttons. Remove Claude API key field. Integrate ProjectChip for active filter display.

title: Update beadsStore for multi-project
description: Add activeProjectId to store. Update fetchBeads to filter by active project. Add project switching logic with proper watcher cleanup.

title: Add project badges to task cards
description: Update KanbanCard and BriefCard to show project badge when multiple projects are loaded. Hide badge when single project filtered.

title: Create CONSTITUTION.md template
description: Create .claude/templates/CONSTITUTION.md.template with sections: Purpose, Target Users, Core Principles, Technical Boundaries, Success Metrics. Use placeholders for substitution.

title: Extend init-project skill for constitution
description: Add Phase 7 to init-project that prompts for constitution details, generates CONSTITUTION.md, and presents for review-and-approve flow.

title: Create ConstitutionReviewer component
description: Dialog modal with accordion sections for reviewing constitution. Each section has Approve/Request Changes buttons, comment textarea. Submit when all sections reviewed.

title: Integration testing
description: Test all three features working together: docs viewer navigation, multi-project switching, and constitution generation flow.

title: Epic close-up checklist
description: Final verification, documentation review, and pattern extraction before closing the epic. See: .claude/skills/approve-spec/docs/closeup-checklist.md

title: Create DocsService for file operations
description: Main process service extending fileWatcher patterns for reading doc files from docs/, .claude/, .design/ folders. Implements docs:list-files and docs:read-file IPC handlers.

title: Create FileTreeNav component
description: Recursive React component for collapsible folder tree with icons (FileText, Settings, Hash). Uses ScrollArea, handles expand/collapse state, shows item counts.

title: Create MarkdownRenderer component
description: React component using react-markdown with remark-gfm and rehype-highlight. Includes floating TOC for long documents, breadcrumb navigation.

title: Create DocsPage with three-column layout
description: New page component at /docs route. Left sidebar (FileTreeNav), main content (MarkdownRenderer), responsive collapse below 768px. Add to App.tsx routes and sidebar nav.

title: Extend Settings interface for multi-project
description: Update Settings type from beadsProjectPath (string) to projects (array of {id, name, path, addedAt, isActive}). Add migration logic in SettingsService for backward compatibility.

title: Add folder picker IPC handler
description: Implement dialog:select-folder IPC handler using Electron dialog.showOpenDialog with openDirectory property. Support both single and multiple selection.

title: Create DragDropZone component
description: React component for drag-and-drop folder addition. Visual states for default, dragOver (border-sky-500), drop success. Validates dropped items are directories.

title: Create ProjectChip filter component
description: Extend KanbanFilters pattern with removable ProjectChip. Color coding (sky-500, emerald-500, violet-500), X button for removal, max 3 visible with overflow.

title: Workflow Hardening & Agent Optimization
description: Comprehensive workflow improvements: file organization (docs/features/<epic>/<task>.md), model optimization (Opus orchestrator / Sonnet sub-agents), missing coding agents, init-project agent generation, skill token reduction (80%), and recovery documentation.

title: Create docs folder structure and migrate root .md files
description: Set up docs/features/, docs/architecture/, docs/guides/. Move existing root .md files to appropriate locations. Update .gitignore for feature artifacts.

title: Modularize run-tasks skill
description: Split 785-line skill into ~300 line core + reference docs (tdd-protocol.md, agent-spawning.md)

title: Modularize approve-spec skill
description: Split 490-line skill into ~250 line core + reference docs (beads-patterns.md)

title: Create /workflow-status skill
description: New skill showing current state: active briefs, open epics, blocked tasks, recent activity, suggested next actions

title: Create recovery-guide.md
description: Document checkpoint commands, state queries, resume procedures in docs/guides/recovery-guide.md

title: Update all agent prompts with output location rules
description: Add output location section to all agents specifying docs/features/<epic>/<task-id>.md pattern

title: Integration test: agent output locations
description: Verify agents write to correct paths in docs/features/, no root .md files created

title: Add model frontmatter to existing agents
description: Add model: sonnet frontmatter to technical-sme, business-sme, context-builder, test-writer-agent, debug-agent, visualization-expert, workflow-domain

title: Create typescript-agent with stack knowledge
description: Agent for TypeScript/Node work with ESM/CJS, vitest, edge function patterns baked in. Model: sonnet

title: Create swift-agent with stack knowledge
description: Agent for Swift/SwiftUI work with state management, Combine, XCTest patterns baked in. Model: sonnet

title: Create sql-agent with stack knowledge
description: Agent for PostgreSQL/Supabase work with RLS, migrations, policy patterns baked in. Model: sonnet

title: Create coding agent templates for init-project
description: Templates at .claude/templates/agents/ for typescript, swift, sql agents with placeholder substitution

title: Update init-project to generate coding agents
description: After stack selection, detect framework and generate matching coding agents from templates

title: Update run-tasks to specify agent output paths
description: When spawning agents, specify output_path: docs/features/<epic>/<task-id>.md in prompt

title: Modularize init-project skill
description: Split 1745-line skill into ~200 line core + reference docs (project-yaml-spec.md, config-merge-patterns.md, init-troubleshooting.md)

title: Parade Init Package Restructure
description: Transform Parade initialization from dual-location (Electron GUI + CLI skill) into a streamlined npm package + enhanced Claude Code skill. Relocate discovery.db to .parade/ directory to clean up user project root. Remove Init Project wizard from Electron app, making it a pure visualization dashboard.

Update Guide page with new terminal-only flow
Update all skills with .parade/ path detection
Add optional first-feature walkthrough to init-project
Test on fresh project

description: Final verification, documentation review, and pattern extraction before closing the epic. Run all tests, verify build, review code quality, update documentation, extract reusable patterns.
close_reason: All implementation tasks complete, typecheck passes, ready for epic closure
